amendment.description: An amendment numbered 15 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to strike funding for firearms and ammunition for the Internal Revenue Service.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to strike funding for firearms and ammunition for the Internal Revenue Service.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Harshbarger amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 238 (Roll no. 625).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Harshbarger amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 238 (Roll no. 625).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
